sentences.sentence: Whatever they do, servants "do it with all their heart" (Colossians 3:23 NIV).
sentences.translation: 仆人无论做什么，都是“从心里作的”(西3：23)。

sentences.sentence: It takes energy to stay the course, "to live a life worthy of the Lord" (Colossians 1:10).
sentences.translation: 要常常“行事为人对得起主”(歌罗西书1：10)，是要下很多工夫的。

sentences.sentence: Paul in his letter to the Colossians sets forth the rich blessings granted to the children of God.
sentences.translation: 保罗写信给歌罗西人的书信中曾说明上帝赐给他儿女的丰富恩典。
